title: There are 4 cups.  Nurse Akali is under one of the cups and Ahri is under the other 3
body: You choose 1 cup but before the cup is lifted 2 of the other cups are lifted revealing 2 Ahris.  You can either stay with the cup you originally chose or switch to the other cup.  If you get an Ahri you get ebola and die but if you get Nurse Akali you will be filled with glorious boobs for the rest of your life.  Should you switch cups?  What is the chance of getting glorious sideboobs for each choice?
